newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - May 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - May 23.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following items on the front page of its business section on May 23:
WASHINGTON - U.S. Office Products Co. said it would acquire Mail Boxes Etc in a transaction valued at about $267 million.
WASHINGTON - The Federal Trade Commission said it is cracking down on magazine telemarketing scam artists which the agency says defraud thousands of consumers of millions of dollars each year.
WASHINGTON - Aetna U.S. Healthcare has quit the industry's key trade association, maintaining it plans to fight the growing consumer and legislative backlash against managed care on its own.
WASHINGTON - Rep. Bill Archer, the Texas Republican who heads the House Ways and Means Committee, faces a tough test turning the balanced budget deal into a tax bill.
